openOverlayFilesFolder.label: Open Overlay Files Folder
openOverlayFilesFolder.tooltip: Opens the folder where the overlay text files are located in.

chosenServer.label: SC2 Region/Server
chosenServer.tooltip:
Choose the SC2 region/server you are playing on.
This selection is optional but increases the accuracy of information.
If your MMR is not properly detected, it would be best to select a server.

"Auto" if you keep switching servers.
Set a specific region if you only play on one region.

findOpponentMmrOption.label: Find Opponent Method
findOpponentMmrOption.tooltip:
We're working with sc2unmasked.com to find the opponent you're playing against and his infos. Sometimes the opponents name is found multiple times and setting the correct method for you can increase the success/accuracy.

Closest MMR:
This method will pick the opponent listed closest to your mmr.

Most Recent Activity:
This method will pick the opponent which has played the most recent ranked match.

enableUnbarcoder.label: Reveal Barcodes and Smurfs
enableUnbarcoder.tooltip: Enable this checkbox to let the script attempt to identify your opponent if your opponent is a barcode or smurf (with the help of sc2unmasked.com).

enabledTitleUpdater.label: Update stream title
enabledTitleUpdater.tooltip:
Enable this checkbox if you want the script to update your title on Twitch.
Note: To use this the 'Twitch oAuth Token' in 'Configuration Options' section is necessary.

enabledOverlayUpdater.label: Update overlay textfiles
enabledOverlayUpdater.tooltip: Enable this checkbox if you want to use the Overlay textfiles.

titleInMenu.label: Title - In Menu
titleInMenu.tooltip:
Twitch title will be updated to this when changing to the SC2 Menu.

Example: [$SERVER] [My MMR: $p1mmr] Waiting for new opponent
Result: [EU] [My MMR: 5000] Waiting for new opponent

titleInGameAsPlayer.label: Title - Ingame (as Player)
titleInGameAsPlayer.tooltip:
Twitch title will be updated to this when starting a new game.

Example: [$SERVER] [My MMR: $p1mmr] $matchup vs $p2name
Result: [EU] [My MMR: 5000] ZvT vs Burny

titleInGameAsCaster.label: Title - Ingame (as Caster)
titleInGameAsCaster.tooltip:
Twitch title will be updated to this when you're in a game as observer or referee.

Example: $p1name vs $p2name ($matchup) - Casting Tournament XY
Result: Showtime vs soO (PvZ) - Casting Tournament XY

titleInGameAsOther.label: Title - Ingame (Teamgame, Coop, Arcade)
titleInGameAsOther.tooltip:
Twitch title will be updated when you're in a game mode like coop, teamgames, arcade or archon.

Example: [$SERVER] $p1mmrmmr plays Funmaps
Result: [EU] 5000mmr plays Funmaps

titleIn1v1Replay.label: Title - In Replay
titleIn1v1Replay.tooltip:
Twitch title will be updated when you're in a replay.

Example: [$SERVER] $p1mmrmmr - Replay Analysis
Result: [EU] 5000mmr - Replay analysis

enableStreamerShoutout.label: Enable Streamer Shoutout
enableStreamerShoutout.tooltip: Enable this checkbox if you want the streamer shoutout to be written to your twitch channel. This only happens if the opponent is streaming right now too.

useMultitwitch.label: Multitwitch instead of Twitch Link
useMultitwitch.tooltip: Enable this checkbox if you want the "$p2url" variable to be replaced with multitwitch link (Example: http://multitwitch.tv/wellbrained/burnysc2) instead of the opponents twitch link (Doesn't work when opponent isn't streaming on Twitch).

postOpponentLinkInChat.value: My opponent $p2name is also streaming currently - Watch from both sides: $p2url
postOpponentLinkInChat.label: Message if opponent is streaming too
postOpponentLinkInChat.tooltip:
If the opponent was found on sc2unmasked and is streaming right now, this message will be written in chat.

Usable variables:
$p1race = Your race
$p2race = Opponents race
$p2name = Opponents name
$p2url = Twitch channel to opponent

streamerBlacklist.label: Blacklist Streamers
streamerBlacklist.tooltip: Enter the Twitch usernames of people you don't want to shoutout. Seperate multiple ones per comma.

devDebugLogging.label: Enable Logging
devDebugLogging.tooltip: Logs the whole process into daily log files in the "Logs" subfolder in case you're running into trouble you can send those to the developers to get looked at.

btnOpenLogFolder.label: Open Logs Folder
btnOpenLogFolder.tooltip: Click the button to open the Logs folder.

oauth.label: Twitch oAuth Token
oauth.tooltip: Enter your oAuth token here which you will get from the button below.

btnGoToOauth.label: Get OAuth Token
btnGoToOauth.tooltip:
You only need the Twitch oAuth Token if you want to update your stream title. Otherwise it's unnecessary to do.

This button will redirect you to WellBrained's website to generate an oAuth access token which allows the script to update your Twitch title.
Click the "Generate oAuth token" button on the website and paste the token in the field above.

btnGoToVariables.label: Overview of all variables
btnGoToVariables.tooltip: This button will redirect you to WellBrained's website to see an overview of all usable variables in the textfields.

gamingPcIp.label: Gaming PC - IP:Port
gamingPcIp.tooltip:
Leave this field empty if you use a single pc setup!

If you are using a dual pc setup enter the gaming pc ip:port in this field.
A step-by-step instruction on how to set it up is within the Readme (click the 'Open Readme.txt' button on top).
